name: Comkai 8 in 1 PC Retro Collection
description:
Welcome to the Comkai 8 in 1 PC 32bit Video Game Collection.

1. Gigacron -

Top down Shooter - Take control of the Gigacron the most powerful space ship in the Galaxy and plow your way through the enemy fleet to the final boss

2. Tinkibon

- Platformer - Play as Tinkibon and solve the puzzles to get all 5 Gems to complete the Game. The Game has a Multiplayer Option.

3. Attricos

- Puzzle - Match all the box shapes to their sockets and win the day! The faster you do it the slower time goes.

4. Decimation Dave -

Platformer - A Game and watch style game where you stop the monsters from escaping the green door. Button A and B shoot from different places

5. Pion -

Shooter - An Action Adventure game where you have blast your way through the walls to find the hidden door to move to the next level.

6. Reign Corp -

A beat em up - Where you battle you way to the last boss, once you power is charged you can blast your way.

7. Zadongo -

Retro tennis - A horizontal pong like game. Hold button A when hitting ball to spin it.

8. Hitbuster Alpha -

A 90s style fighting Game with a beat em up and (SFG) simple touch screen strategy mode.
